import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Error from './Error'; export default function UpdateForm(props) { let { handleSubmit, id, tmpData, setName, setEmail, setGender, setStatus, errorMessage, setError } = props.UpdateUserState; return (

setName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Mark Stoenis" />
setEmail(e.target.value)} defaultValue={tmpData.email} placeholder="example@test.com" />
setGender(e.target.value)} defaultChecked={tmpData.gender === "Male"} name="gender" value="Male" />
setGender(e.target.value)} defaultChecked={tmpData.gender === "Female"} name="gender" value="Female" />
setStatus(e.target.value)} />
setStatus(e.target.value)} />
{ errorMessage && { setError(undefined) }}> }
